element.name: The Throne by K1, Traditional Cache (1/3)
element.description: There are various options for routes to this cache, so I'll leave that to the finders.
element.long-description:
Brown/orange Tupperware container with clear lid. It is hidden in a small pile of rocks, but should be very easy to find. See photos attached.
Contents:
Notebook
Pen
online.ie coaster
Proud to be Irish bumber sticker
Irish Abroad keyring
People doing Day 1 of the Wicklow Way could find this cache and 2 Stone Lighter with slight [relative to the lenght of the day's route!] detours.
element.encoded-hints: It's about ninety metres South of Prince William's Seat.

ul.li:
2010-05-22T19:00:00Z : Found it by Laura374
Found with pplsgod, great day for it too. TFTC!

2010-05-22T19:00:00Z : Found it by pplsgod
Found this today with Laura374 while out hiking on a beautiful sunny day
Didn't have the GPS as we were not planning on Geocaching today but took a chance on a suspicious looking pile of rocks and luckily it was there.
Just signed the log.
TFTC

2010-04-25T19:00:00Z : Found it by kaputing
Pile of rocks in now a collection of slabs. We found more of the contents of the cache and put them in. Signed sheet. Cache safe but could really do with a spruce up. Fantastic location with a lovely view of my old house. Thanks for it.

2010-03-14T22:15:58Z : Needs Maintenance by Spark_ie
Cache has been muggled, and nothing is left in the cache.. I have re-hidden the cache in the original location, but will need a new logbook etc....

2010-03-13T20:00:00Z : Found it by Spark_ie
Found this cache easily, too easily, the box was lying opened among the rocks at gz... Unfortunately there was nothing left only a rusty coin and a stone.. I left a piece of paper with my name on it... Lovely area for a cache though, thanks for bringing me up here !! Spark_ie
